DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine effect genetic variant response SSRIs obsessive-compulsive disorder ( OCD ) subject . The investigator recruit drug-naive drug-free ( > 3 month ) OCD subject ( n=200 ) . The participant get SSRIs OCD symptom . The type dose SSRIs restrict depend individual participant 's state . However , investigator recommend follow usual clinical guideline ( Korean treatment algorithm OCD , 2004 ) . At baseline , 4 month , 6 month , 1 year treatment , participant evaluate Yale-Brown Obsessive-Compulsive Scale ( YBOCS ) , Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) , Dimensional Obsessive-Compulsive Scale ( DOCS ) , Toronto alexithymia scale ( TAS ) , interpersonal reactivity index ( IRI ) , Barratt impulsiveness scale ( BIS ) , Measure Constructs Underlying Perfectionism ( M-CUP ) . And participant donate 5 ml whole blood DNA extract . Using various genetic analysis method genotyping , exome sequencing , analyze association various genetic variant anti-obsessive-compulsive response .
